audioText: Le chirurgien inquiétait ses patients en expliquant que réparer la chair endommagée prendrait plusieurs mois de soins intensifs.
question: What did the surgeon explain to the patients?
options: Repairing the damaged flesh would require several months of intensive care
The surgery would be completed in a few hours
The damaged tissue could not be repaired at all
Only minor treatment would be needed for recovery
explanation: The text states 'Le chirurgien inquiétait ses patients en expliquant que réparer la chair endommagée prendrait plusieurs mois de soins intensifs' - The surgeon worried his patients by explaining that repairing the damaged flesh would take several months of intensive care.
